items.title: censusYears

growthRate.description: Growth rate of the world in that calendar year.

deathsMln.title: deathsMln
deathsMln.description: Number of deaths in that calendar year, expressed in millions.

birthsMln.description: Number of births in that calendar year, expressed in millions.

nextYearPredictionMln.description: UN prediction of the number of people in the following year, expressed in millions.

numberOfCountries.title: numberOfCountries
numberOfCountries.description: Number of UN member states in that calendar year.

numberOfPeopleMln.description: Number of people on Earth in that calendar year, expressed in millions.
